about.vision.content: We believe in young people and want to give them financial superskills - for life. At Gimi, we believe that Financial Superskills are essential in a cashless society and that young people should learn how to earn, save and spend their own money. This is why we‚Äôre building the best finance app on the planet for young people.

security.hero.title: S√§kerhet och licenser
security.hero.subtitle: Gimi arbetar f√∂r att unga och deras familjer p√• ett s√• s√§kert s√§tt som m√∂jligt ska kunna hantera pengar. Vi f√∂ljer regler och direktiv och arbetar st√§ndigt f√∂r att vara i framkant f√∂r att skydda v√•ra anv√§ndare.
security.certification.title: Certifieringar
security.certification.subtitle: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)
security.details.title: Hur vi arbetar med s√§kerhet
security.details.body1: When you‚Äôre not managing real money in the Gimi app, security is probably not your greatest concern. But you should know we treat your personal data with huge respect, encrypting it all using SSL/HTTPS. We would never sell your data to third parties, and you can always ask us to permanently delete all your personal data. We are regulated by the personuppgiftslagen and follow international GDPR regulations strictly.
security.details.body2: For our Premium users, who manage real money in the app, we provide an extra level of security. According to the Swedish Datainspektionen, we use Strong Customer Authentication to secure your account. And for your own safety, we verify your identity before you can start managing money. In bank language, this is called Know Your Customer - all according to international banking regulations.
security.details.feature1.subtitle: We care about your data, and we work closely with our partners to make sure both we fulfill all international GDPR regulations.
security.details.feature2.subtitle: Users managing real money in the app can feel safe, your data is protected with a two factor authentication method.
security.details.feature3.subtitle: For users ordering the Card, we use Intantor to comply with all regulations around verifying users identity.
security.details.feature4.subtitle: In order to handle sensitive card data, such as card PINs and card details, we are compliant with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS).
